casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Vaughn OUTLAW Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 28, 2018 Mary A. BeaUie, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Sarah Hanna, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 345 , --- A.3d ---- (2018), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
